headline: 1 Unstoppable Stock Down Over 60% That I'm Buying Like There's No Tomorrow
summary: One of those I've recently increased my position in is The Trade Desk (NASDAQ: TTD).  The Trade Desk had a rough fourth quarter and has announced some changes.  Not many people are familiar with The Trade Desk, but you've likely interacted with its software without knowing.
